content: stupid- easy cable hat revised by cheri pelletier painted sky washable wool talk about stupid i made a really stupid mistake on the original pattern for this hat my apologies for the error in the pattern with the wrong number of cast-on stitches exactly twice the number needed the original pattern has the correct number so i can t explain it in correcting the pattern i have made a couple of adjustments that make it easier to read and to knit materials worsted weight yarn 100% super wash wool painted sky noro malabrigo rios work well size seven 16 inch circular needles size five 16 inch circular needles size 7 double point needles cable needle there are now three variations for you version 1 consists of 2by2 cables floating on a background of purls version 2 uses more cables and less purls version 3 uses a 3by 3 cable with 2 purl stitches in between all versions are done with left cables holding yarn on cable needles in front which i think is easier 2/2 cable left slip 2 sts on cable needle hold in front k2 sts from left needle k2 sts from cable needle 3/3 cable left slip 3 sts on cable needle hold in front k3 sts from left needle k3 sts from cable needle version one cast-on with smaller needles cast on 96 stiches marking end of round brim k2 p2 ribbing for 2 inches body switch to size 7 circs row 1-4 k4 p4 times 12 place markers between repeats optional row 5 2/2 cable left purl 4 12 times row 6-9 k4 p4 12 times repeat the last five row until hat body reaches 71/2 inches in length crown switch to dpns when the stitches are not comfortable on the circs start decreases round 1 1k2 k2tog p2 p2tog round 2 k3 p3 round 3 k1 k2tog p1 p2tog round 4 k2 p2 round 5 k2tog p2 round 6 k1 p2 round 7 k1 p2tog remove markers round 8 k1 p1 round 9 k2 decrease round 10 knit round 11 k2tog cut thread yarn through sts pull tight and finish off version two want more cables same cast-on same brim body row 1-4 k4 p2 x16 row 6-9 k4 p2 x16 row 5 2/2 cable left p2 x16 repeat the last five row until hat body reaches 71/2 inches in length same crown version three want fatter cables same cast-on same brim body row 1-4 k6 p2 pm x12 row 6-9 k6 p2 x12 row 5 3/3 cable left p2 x12 repeat the last five row until hat body reaches 71/2 inches in length same crown easy- peasy baby hat newborn 13 5 inch gauge 5 3 st/inch on size 6 needles cast on 72 stitches brim 12 row k2 p2 rib on size 4 circs body switch to size 6 and mark repeat sections pattern repeat 12 stitches times 6 per row row 1 k6 p6 row 2 p1 k5 p5 k1 row
